references.paper_title: Microsoft coco: Common objects in context
references.reason: This paper introduces the MS-COCO dataset, which is used to create the evaluation benchmarks in this work.

references.paper_title: Orient anything: Learning robust object orientation estimation from rendering 3d models
references.reason: This paper presents a foundational discriminative model for image-based orientation estimation which used as test-time guidance.

references.paper_title: Grounding dino: Marrying dino with grounded pre-training for open-set object detection
references.reason: This paper propose open-set object de-tection model used to estimate object bounding box, with which we obtain pseudo-GT grounding orientations.
This paper propose one-step text-to-image generative flow model, where in this study, we employed FLUX-Schnell as our one-step T2I generative model.

references.paper_title: Learning continuous 3d words for text-to-image generation
references.reason: This is the current state-of-the-art in view-conditioned image generation. The work presents C3DW, an orientation-to-image model for single objects, against which the authors compare ORIGEN.
